    • Constructor Detail

      • Bishop

        public Bishop(java.lang.String color,
              Chessboard board,
              int row,
              int column)
        Bishop constructor

        The constructor for Bishop calls the ChessPiece super constructor.

        Parameters:
        color - Description: The color of the Bishop. Can be w or b for white and black.
        board - Description: The chessboard the Bishop is located in.
        row - Description: The row the Bishop starts on in the chessboard.
        column - Description: The column the Bishop starts on in the chessboard.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableMoves

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAvailableMoves()
        Gets all available moves for the Bishop.

        determines the legal squares that this Bishop can move to from its current location Bishops can move: as far as the player would like in a unblocked diagonal line

        Specified by:
        getAvailableMoves in class ChessPiece
        Returns:
        Description: Returns the ArrayList of all possible moves the Bishop can take from its current location.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the String representation of this piece.

        Returns a String representation of this piece, which is its one-letter color appended by "B", representing its status as a Bishop.

        Specified by:
        toString in class ChessPiece
        Returns:
        Description: Returns the string representation of this piece.
